Chinese.Description: 受到蜈蚣电击时，玩家免疫其伤害并能把电击转化为电能储存在体内，储存的电能可保存至下个循环。当被其他生物（蜈蚣除外）抓住时，玩家会一次性释放所有电能对抓取者及一定范围内生物造成电击伤害

English.Description: Players won't get hurt from centipede shocking and can store electric energy from it. The stored electric energy can be saved to next cycle. When caught by other non-player creatures (except centipedes), players will release all energy to deal electric damage to the grabbers other non-player creatures in range
